dcterms:description: The Carolina dataset encompasses a diverse array of domains, including wikis, university documents, social media interactions, the legislative branch, and various other public domain sources. It contains 823 million tokens and two million text entries.
dcterms:title: Carolina

dcterms:description: The brWAC dataset is a web crawl of Brazilian web pages, resulting in approximately 17.5 GB of processed text.
dcterms:title: brWAC

dcterms:creator: Livy Real
Erick Fonseca
Hugo Goncalo Oliveira
dcterms:description: The ASSIN2 dataset contains sentence pairs of premises and hypotheses, with annotations for binary classification and similarity scoring.
dcterms:title: ASSIN2

dcterms:creator: Pedro H. Luz de Araujo

dcterms:description: LeNERBR is a dataset for Named Entity Recognition (NER) in Brazilian legal text, containing seven different classes.
dcterms:title: LeNERBR

dcterms:creator: Francielle Alves Vargas

dcterms:description: HateBR is a dataset for classifying whether a tweet is inappropriate or malicious, annotated for offensive language and hate speech detection.
dcterms:title: HateBR
